name: Parasitoid
description:
You are a small parasite in a thriving dungeon ecosystem.  By tricking creatures into eating you, you can take over their bodies and move up the food chain one step at a time.  Explore, dominate the ecosystem, and challenge a powerful boss for control over the dungeon!

Made for GDL Game Jam 08/2022 by Charles Cooper (Discord: @I Rate Burritos #0599) and Jinseo Park (Discord: TrueWis#8004)

Special Thanks:

Goldmetal for jelly sprites.

ccadory for plant sprites and animation.

Moonflower Carnivore for bubble effect.

Sunny Valley Studio for map generation.

SoundBits for Sound FXs.
